spiritsExplanation:
The workout "Canadian Connections Row" prominently incorporates an outdoor rowing setting, as seen in the accompanying image and title, indicating a strong presence of the "Outdoor & Adventure" spirit. The inclusion of nature and possibly new terrains supports a score of 0.9 for this spirit.

Additionally, the workout emphasizes rhythm with a maximum rhythm of 28 and a category that includes 'sweat', indicating a continuous, music-driven effort. The playlist features well-known pop and global hits, further emphasizing this rhythmic element and suggesting a "Flow & Rhythm" spirit with a score of 0.6.

The "High-Energy & Intense" and "Soothing & Restorative" spirits were considered but not selected. The intensity level being only 2 out of 3 and the focus on community and learning about rowing reduce the likelihood of a high-energy classification, and the absence of specific recovery or relaxation cues rules out a restorative spirit.
